title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A classic American novel set in the Jazz Age, exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream. The story follows Jay Gatsby's pursuit of his lost love, Daisy Buchanan, in the glamorous yet morally bankrupt world of 1920s New York.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A powerful story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South. Through the eyes of young Scout Finch, we witness her father Atticus's courageous defense of a Black man wrongly accused of a crime.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian masterpiece depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance. Winston Smith's struggle against the oppressive regime of Big Brother remains a chilling warning about government overreach and the manipulation of truth.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A timeless romance and social commentary on class and marriage in Regency England. Elizabeth Bennet's wit and independence clash with Mr. Darcy's pride in this beloved tale of misunderstanding and eventual love.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A coming-of-age story following teenager Holden Caulfield through New York City. His cynical yet vulnerable voice captures the alienation and confusion of adolescence in post-war America.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An enchanting fantasy adventure following Bilbo Baggins on an unexpected journey with dwarves and a wizard. This prelude to The Lord of the Rings introduces Middle-earth's magic, dragons, and the power of courage in the smallest of heroes.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The magical beginning of Harry Potter's journey from orphaned boy to wizard. Discovering Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry learns about his past, makes lifelong friends, and faces the dark wizard who killed his parents.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An epic high fantasy trilogy following the quest to destroy the One Ring. Frodo Baggins and the Fellowship journey through Middle-earth in this timeless tale of friendship, sacrifice, and the battle between good and evil.
